question: Exercise ‘Bold Kurukshetra-2019’ was held between India and which of the following countries?
explanation: The joint military exercise titled “Bold Kurukshetra-2019” was held between the Indian Army and Singapore Armed Forces (SAF) at Babina Cantonment in Jhansi, Uttar Pradesh from April 8 to 11. The purpose of the exercise was to develop military technology, enhance the maritime security and bolster the nations\' fight against terrorism.
